channel.title: KamFurDev's Cool Website
channel.description: Recent content on KamFurDev's Cool Website

item.title: Website Update
item.description: You have probably noticed that the website got a HUGE update. Well, I switched to using the PaperMod theme. You can still view the old posts, as I had archived them. The main reason to do this was so I could use Org Mode1, which ox-hugo2 uses PaperMod3 as a template for it. PaperMod3 looks way nicer than the theme I used before. Since I currently am using the Tokyo Night4 theme, I might update the CSS of the website to have the Tokyo Night4 theme as the website theme.

item.title: My favorite VSCode Extension
item.description: ℹ️ This is not an ad. I just like this extension. My favorite VSCode extension is VSpaceCode. It is the closest thing to make VSCode more like Emacs and evil-mode. It has Which Key, which will, show you what key to press in its menu (which you call with space while in NORMAL mode) to do a certain action. It also has a Magit Clone, which Magit is the best keyboard based Git Manager.

item.title: Buttons!
item.description: Click me to go home. Thanks to Nelis Oostens for the code!

item.title: Insert Randomness Update!
item.description: After a long break from making games, I’m working on games again! This was a project I was wanting to work on. The name Insert Randomness may seem stupid, but it’s to show that the game has a lot of random things going on in it. What this game will include: ℹ️ This is subject to change. A (hopefully not bad) story Weird Characters Text based graphics Being On All PC Platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux) Here is a link to the GitHub Page, but it’s in it’s early stages.

item.title: Windows Is Trash
item.description: I made the mistake of dual booting Windows, which destroyed the boot partition for Linux. The reason was to play Windows games easier (which is a stupid thought since that is becoming easier in Linux) It took me a bit to get a Linux USB going to repair the boot partition. In the process of doing that, Windows died. So I had to use the family pc for making a usb.

item.title: What is the Theme for the Website?
item.description: The theme I’m using for the website is Everforest Dark, which is a Neovim theme. This was before the website update Not much else to say. Have a good day!

item.title: Fixed About Link
item.description: You should be able to click the About link now. Also, I updated the site a bit more to remove placeholder text from the theme I used for the website.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Welcome to my Website! I will be posting about my projects, and other things. This first post will serve as a test of how markdown is displayed on the website (so I can fix CSS issues). Second Heading Third Fourth Some style testing. bro notch needs to get on this asap how am i supposed to play my infinite lego game Some guy in the Modern Beta SMP Discord Server First item Second item Third item First item Second item Third item code
